statements: UPDATE SalesData SET units_sold = 100, revenue = 5000.00 WHERE sales_id = 1
UPDATE SalesData SET album_name = 'New Album', price_per_unit = 15.99 WHERE artist_name = 'Artist XYZ'
UPDATE SalesData SET units_sold = 50, revenue = 5000.00 WHERE sales_id = 1001
UPDATE SalesData SET price_per_unit = 15.75, revenue = units_sold * price_per_unit WHERE album_name = 'Greatest Hits'
UPDATE sales_data SET units_sold = 50, total_revenue = 5000.00 WHERE sale_id = 101;
UPDATE revenue_analysis SET revenue_generated = 7500.00, recommended_actions = 'Increase marketing budget' WHERE analysis_id = 201;
UPDATE sales_data SET total_revenue = 1500.75, units_sold = 50 WHERE sale_id = 101;
UPDATE revenue_analysis SET recommended_actions = 'Increase marketing efforts', revenue_generated = 2500.50 WHERE analysis_id = 201;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = 1500.00 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE revenue_data SET revenue_amount = 800.50, revenue_date = '2022-09-10' WHERE revenue_id = 3;
UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = sale_amount + 1000 WHERE sale_id = 1;
UPDATE revenue_data SET revenue_amount = revenue_amount - 500 WHERE revenue_id = 3;
UPDATE sales SET units_sold = 50, total_revenue = 5000.00 WHERE id = 'c84c0400-62b5-4f86-b9e7-fff6f305ae77';
UPDATE revenue_stats SET total_sales = 1000, total_revenue = 25000.00 WHERE sales_id = 'c84c0400-62b5-4f86-b9e7-fff6f305ae77';
UPDATE sales SET total_revenue = total_revenue * 1.1, units_sold = units_sold + 5 WHERE artist_name = 'Coldplay' AND unit_price > 15.00;
UPDATE revenue_stats SET total_sales = total_sales + 10 WHERE sales_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j' AND sales_year = 2022;
UPDATE sales_data SET price = 10.25, quantity = 50 WHERE product_name = 'Product1';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = quantity + 1, price = price * 1.1 WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE customers SET address = '123 Main Street, New York' WHERE customer_id = 100;
